===Etymology===
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=しらつち|白|tr1=しら, shira|t1=white|土|tr2=つち, tsuchi|t2=earth, soil}}. The ''shira'' portion can alternately be pronounced ''shiro''.

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|しらつち}}

{{ja-noun|しろつち}}

# white [[soil]] or [[earth]], such as [[chalk]]
# [[kaolin]] or other [[clay]] used for [[pottery]] or [[ceramics]]
# white [[lacquer]]

====Usage notes====
Uncommon spelling. More commonly spelled as {{l|ja|白土}}.
